subject: Rugby (Game)
World Cup 2011 (Rugby)
lead_paragraph: New Zealand delivered the first big blowout of the 2011 World Cup with an 83-7 hammering of Japan to open the second weekend of the tournament.
snippet: New Zealand delivered the first big blowout of the 2011 World Cup with an 83-7 hammering of Japan to open the second weekend of the tournament.
